content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were in our den watching tv at 8:40pm pst. he saw a super fast light blue ball with a trail following at an intense speed from the east towards the west over the bay area.  from oakland towards the pacific ocean between the san mateo bridge and the bay bridge.  it was extremely large (size of a pingpong ball) and high in the sky (over a mile up) it was on a straight trajectory towards the coast. there are always numerous aircraft up at all times.  i can usually see at least 13 or more over the bay area at one time. it flew overhead and was just gone in a split second. feelings about are wow! best description is wonderment and excitement.
content.summary: Light blue fireball streaking across s.F. bayarea from east to west towards pacific ocean

content.detailedDescription: I went to a seafood festival in morehead city north carolina on 10/01/2016  i was leaving the event at 9;10 when the fireworks began to go off.I started looking in the sky at them as i was walking buy 10th street 6 blocks from the display.Something caught my eye in the sky to the right.8 pulsateing lights green about 1000 ft. in the sky 1/4 mile to the right just sitting and pulsateing perfectly still.About 2 minutes later it began to move slowly to the left then right above the coast here.Out of nowhere all the lights brightend to a brilliant red for 30 seconds then returned to a pulsating green and kept moving different directions slowly.As soon as the grand finaly went off it took off out to sea at a very high rate of speed...
content.summary: Was looking at fireworks when i noticed an object to the right in sky sitting there then moving slowly to the right and left..It had 8 green lights pulsateing that changed ti a bright red at times.It was the way it moved that made me think that this is un

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I glanced out my window and noticed a strangely moving object in the far distance, i immediately shouted my daughter who came up and watched what occurred. a light was flashing on and off moving along in a straight line, it then stopped in position and the lights flashed repeatedly before it  suddenly ascended at extreme speed it then turned back on itself going the opposite direction before we lost sight. my daughter who is sceptical about such events was laughing and jested for them to give us a sign, immediately after saying this a beam of light shot across the sky and we lost track of the object as we both panicked and left the room, when we returned the sky was clear other than stars.
content.summary: Witnessed from bedroom window multiple ufos with strange movements and extreme speeds

content.detailedDescription:
I was inside my house, which was just outside of boise, reading a book when i heard a roaring sound overhead. i went outside to check and saw this bright, white ship that was about 120 feet wide with reddish-orange lights - all of which were extremely bright and flashed in a sequence. it was just floating there, i thought the sound was a thunderclap, but i guess i was wrong. it landed about 80 feet away from me, and i saw a door open, and humanoid aliens stepped out of the ship.

when the aliens saw me, they came towards me. i tried to escape, but they ended up being too fast for me to outrun them. they must have knocked me out, because i woke up naked, strapped to some sort of examination table, which had a lot of sharp devices around it. one of the aliens came up to the table and picked up what looked like a syringe with a very large needle. the alien stuck the needle in my right thigh, and that was when everything became a blur... the alien was doing some sort of full-body examination, but when he was done, he knocked me out again.

i woke up back on my lawn, clothed and clean, and with a device in my hand. the device contained a clip of one of the aliens speaking. i went inside to make sure they did not do anything more than an examination. when i was checking myself, i found this very long scar going down my entire right side, from just below my armpit all the way to my ankle. i am now genuinely afraid for my life, and every time i go somewhere, i have to look to the skies to make sure the aliens are not stalking me.
content.summary: I heard a roaring, and then saw the object. i was abducted...

content.detailedDescription:
1. vacancy on the isle of man

2. a different object than visible birds and airplanes in my field of vision

3. ufo

4. when taking pictures of the halo around the sun from the coast towards the sea i glimpse on the left a falling object like a leaf above the sea. then the object is stabilized and left southbound at an extreme speed hours of operation boats on the sea and had observed before. ouis entered in the clouds and i saw shone but very far. i could take a picture.

5. that it was a new ufo sighting for me and very happy to see a photo that proves is that i saw.

6. the object is gone straight south
content.summary: Fell from the sky like a dead leaf and dark straight to at least 5 x faster than a plane
content.locationName: Isle of Man, Isle of Man

content.detailedDescription: I was 17, my bedroom was on the 2nd floor, windows were 12 feet off the ground. i got up to use the bathroom around 2 am. something made me look at my window, being was hovering there outside, where no human could have been. silver grey, large black orb eye. communicated to me, (without speaking), that i should not fear him. i was not afraid, we stared at each other for about 1+2 minutes, no other contact was attempted. i felt calm but sure of what i saw. left to the restroom, entity was gone when i came back. for 43 years i have never questioned what i saw. always hoped to see something again, but never have. i felt peace and understanding, if that makes any sense.
content.summary: Was 17, got up to go to the bathroom, saw entity outside window.

content.detailedDescription: 9:00 pm 10/01/16  while walking on siesta key beach my wife and i witnessed a transparent triangle object moving silently in the sky over the ocean. stars were visible through the object. it disappeared after five to seven seconds.
content.summary: 9:00 pm 10/01/16  my wife and i witnessed a transparent triangle object moving silently in the sky over the ocean. stars were visible through the object. it disappeared after five to seven seconds.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking out of house to my car parked at the end of my driveway.  i noticed there was an orange light about 30 yards down my driveway near a not longer powered dusk to dawn light:  it grabbed my attention because it appeared as if the light was on but i noticed it was infact the light was not on.  the orange glowing orb was the source of the light.  it hovered for at least one minute and made no sound.  i didn't fear what i was looking at, but i felt i personally was intentionally being observed or watched.  it was about halfway up the treeline and flew sideways behind the trees and disappeared out of my sight.  i thought i might observe the object again as i drove away from my home in a similiar direction, but i did not see the object again.
content.summary: Large glowing orb

content.detailedDescription: I was getting ready to go to sleep and all my lights were off, when suddenly i saw a blinking red light from my window (4 fast blinks then a long blink). i suspected it was a drone but was very suspicious as it was night and it moved in a very smooth manor. as i looked outside (window open) i could hear a very constant whirring noise as the ufo moved across the sky in such a quiet yet rapid line. the object moved at a constant rate with a whirring noise, sort of sounding like a jet would make yet very very quiet. i moved across the sky effortlessly. the red light that blinked never stopped and repeated the same blinking pattern, 4 fast blinks then a long blink. i was confused at first and tried to remain calm. i looked online if anyone had witnessed this but no reports came up. i was very confused trying to think what object would fly so perfect at night, be so quiet, have a constant blink, and be so fast. i lost sight of the object when it flew past my window (600 ft away) and flew behind some trees. i didn't see it afterwards.
content.summary: I saw blinking red lights outside. i thought it was a drone but i've never seen a drone move so fast so quietly.... and it was night.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 2:45 am til 3:26 i monitored an object approximately 20,000 ft in the sky. the object had a star like quality but had an elongated shape to it. when i first noticed it it was upright and straight @ 12 oclock and after an unknown amount of time maybe 7-8 minutes it turned in its axis and lay at a two o clock position.The objects light patterns were extremely bright in comparison with anything else in the sky with a bright blue light at the top of the thin cyndrilical object to an alternating red and phosphoric white center. the colors were extreme bright.Another characteristic of the object is that the lights would flash from one side of it to the other with most of the movement toward the center of the object and it seemed to bend into a vshape as if an arc of electricity. i wanted to film it but my battery was almost dead ony phone. i observed this at first from my balcony after some time maybe ten minutes i got my phone's portable external battery and called my neighbor..He came out at approximately 3:15 30 minutes into my observations. at which time i had to go back in the house and tend to my cooking..I watched the object another ten minutes perhaps before my eyes got too tired to watch ..Somewhere around 3:15-3:20 the object seemed to move further away into the southeast sky.
content.summary: A cyndrilical shaped object that would lay on its side from 12 position to 2 position and shape would bend like a v

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: As i stepped out into my back yard at 7:45 pm on the 28th of september 2016 i spotted to the east a very bright white light moving just over the casey's down the street from me. it was moving very slowly.Almost as if it was hovering. i grabbed my binoculars for a better look and i could see that it was actually 3 bright white lights in a straight row. no other lights were visible. if i watched it for about 1 minute, maybe 2, and then the lights just turned off. as i looked through my binoculars i could not see anything there. just blank sky. i continued to search the sky for a while both with and without binoculars. at 8:14 pm directly straight up from the position that the lights vanished, in the great square of the pegasus constellation i witnessed a very bright flash as if someone had just taken a picture from the sky. i looked with my binoculars but there was nothing there to see. a moment later i watched another light begin moving slowly across the milky way heading north. this light started moving not to far from where the flash was seen.
content.summary: 3 extremely bright white lights very slowly moving across the sky then just vanishing

content.detailedDescription: I was travelling with my mum on a train late one night, the time was around 12 midnight, the year was between 1985 to 1990 i was about 13-14, i was looking out the window when i noticed coloured lights level with train at about 100-200 meters away, it was hard to tell exactly cause it was so dark. at first i thought it was a truck(semi) with trailer lights on,but then i thought about it and the hi way was on the other side of the train, then i thought it was a farmer having a party with lights hung up around his house, then i realised that if it was a house or stationery object that it would be far behind the train, then i thought it might be a refection of something in the train, so i cupped my hands up close to the window to stop any light coming from inside the train, that's when i noticed that when the lights came to a cleared paddock it would descend and when it came to trees it would then go up,that's when the hairs on the back of my neck stood up i sat there and thought of everything it could be but everything i thought of it wasn't, i sat there for about 5-10 minutes, watching these lights then i asked mum to come and have a look, buy the time she stood up and looked out my window as she was on the other side of the train, when we looked out the lights where gone.
content.summary: I saw lights out the window of a train

content.detailedDescription: When i was walking on the street alone, suddenly a light caught my eyes, then i looked up. at first i thought it's a helicopter, but soon i realized it's not because it made small noise(much smaller than normal helicopter). after i realized it was something unusual, i immediately took out my phone and tried to take photos, however, unfortunately i forgot to turn off the flashlight, and after i took the first photo(with flashlight), the object began to change its direction and flew away(didn't speeded up). it looked like today's modern warplane but it's much quieter. after i witnessed it, my first reaction was to call authorities to report this case, but i didn't find any number to call so i gave up. and as i searched on google how to report, the object went out of my sight, when i realized i should chase it it's already too late.
content.summary: See detailed discriptions

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i was trying out a 10,000,000 candle power flashlight and made the comment let see if we can find the space station and was shining it into the sky and after only a few sec. this object came from the s.W. so fast it seem instant. it was huge! so huge that it block out the sky over my yard, i was standing there looking up a the size and my friend said what in the hell is that and i said i don't see the flag or u.S.A.F. on it and then i heard  the door slam? my friend and run into the house and left me out there in the yard by myself. then as fast as it came it left in the same direction, i then went into the house and said to my friend what happen to you? he just set on the chair and would not give me a answer he was that scared. i haven't seen it since. when i was looking at it i could see  structure and notice lights and windows and the sheer size of the object, it wasn't large it was massive.  dean hooker
content.summary: I had 10,000,000 flashlight and was shining it up in the sky and from the sw the object stop over my house for 20 sec and then left the same direction

content.detailedDescription:
Traingle shape craft that i recorded stoping falling object to earth and installed an rocket 
and made it fly off in a diffrent dirrection my video youtube / aliens in west palm
content.summary: Looked like some sort of rock huge was falling to earth in a orange fire ball the clearly visible ship flu under object and atached some sort of rocket and after two huge explosions the rock roketed off in the opposite direction it left a blue plum i

content.detailedDescription: I did not write down anything about this event - and i have no idea why, even when i knew i had seen an unidentified flying object.  i can only say that this occurred in the beginning months of 2016.  i was walking my dogs home from a short walk a few minutes from my home.  the sky was so unbelievably blue and completely cloudless.  just looking up one couldn't possibly miss seeing the contrail forming in the nw sky.  nearly as soon as i saw it i knew it could not be something from earth.  having seen rockets from the cape, it could not have been that.  one reason is it's pattern was sharp and each zig and zag was identical in length and size.  the second reason was the tightly formed contrail that was forming the pattern did not dissipate or feather out into the atmosphere as it went in a complete loop down then up and over the beginning of the contrail pattern as it was when i first saw it.  it is hard for me to say as to whether it then went straight away from me or whether it went straight up.  as it came out of the loop and seemed to straighten itself out of the zig-zag, i still could not see what was at the head of the contrail (at no time could i see anything which was making the contrail) but along side of the head of the contrail there suddenly appeared two black objects which appeared as black dots one under the other on the right side however only one black dot appeared on the top left with none underneath.  believe it or not, i just took my eye off of it and i don't remember looking back.  unless it wasn't too high up in the atmosphere i  don't see why it wouldn't have been picked up on radar.  if i'm not mistaken it would have been around south of orlando but not too far because it wasn't completely due west.  my reaction to seeing such a sight was sort of "see we've been telling people all along there are extraterrestrial vehicle's and not weather balloons or anything else an earthling might try to put in flight". seeing one makes me feel as if we are all vindicated. i have nothing but my word and this account of what i saw.
content.summary: Well formed contrail made tight zig-zag flight pattern, into loop, appeared to go straight up with two black forms right side one, left

content.detailedDescription: Was standing outside on the south side of my house and looked up in the sky.I saw reported object and ran inside the house to grab my cellphone.Came back outside and started taking pictures of the object.While observing the object it slowly gained altitude while moving to the north west.The object continued to slowly gain altitude until it went above the cloud and could no longer be seen.Object appeared to be emitting a beam of light underneath it the entire time i observed it.
content.summary: Unidentified craft in orlando observed moving slowly and emitting a beam from underneath it.

content.detailedDescription:
Stepped out to have a cigarette, noticed movement to my left, looked up in a northwest direction and noticed an object moving toward me at about
40 degrees to the horizon.Lights from the city cast a dim light upon the underbelly of the craft allowing me to determine it was solid and had shape. as it started moving overhead i noticed it had an array of lights underside, five total small in comparison to the overall size of the object, pinkish in color and appeared to be round in shape. the lights were configured in the the shape of a chevron.   the craft itself had a very distinctive outline, that of a triangle. the craft moved in a straight line from nw to se making no sound, totally silent. the craft moved over the waters of lavaca bay and i lost sight of it. 

as to my feelings during the event, i became very exited, somewhat fortunate to be able to witness such an event. i was in a clear state of mind and knew what i saw was real. i had a very good and distinct view of this craft. as for the present i am left with a lot of questions and i would like to have some answers.
content.summary: Triangular, large, 5 lights pinkish in color in the shape of a chevron but dim.

content.detailedDescription: I was living in san antonio, tx on the northwest side near utsa in a subdivision called college park. that summer the city was experiencing a water shortage so water rationing was being enforced. in order to water your lawn you could only do it by hand with a garden hose. so late one night around 10 or 11 pm i was in my front yard watering my grass by hand. the cul de sac i lived on had one street light which provided plenty of light to see by so i didn't have my porch light on. it was a beautiful warm clear night so i happened to look up to admire the stars. this was when i noticed there was something wrong. looking straight up the stars seemed blurry. the only way to describe it is; like trying to look through a clear jellyfish. or heat waves in the summer over a long highway in extreme heat. i kept looking at it and then i would look down thinking it was my vision. but when i looked up again it was still there. i then looked out in a different direction instead of up and things looked normal. this was when i felt uneasy and decided to go in the house. the only people i mentioned this incident to were family and close friends. at that time i didn't know who or if i should report it. at the time it was so surreal.
content.summary: Looked like trying to look through a jellyfish in the night sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Teardrop diamond shape small short trail.

i was standing outside my house, just as i went to tern to walk back in my house then seen the object.

it was not a shooting star or meteorite, i have seen many of them before. this was different and controlled. it was flying across the sky and slightly went up and disappeared in thin air.

this is not the 1st time. i had seem 3 so far this year, and this one is the 4th one this year.
content.summary: Fly across the sky fast, slight ascend disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
It was approximately 10:30 in the evening, i was staying in brean, somerset, on a week's break.
as usual when staying there i took my two dogs for a last walk of the day, ready to bed them down for the evening.
i took them as usual down onto the beach - (brean sands).
i always take a torch to see where i'm walking with, as the beach here is behind sand dunes and so away from the main street and the street lighting.
the weather that evening was fairly mild, a clear cloudless night with a slight south westerly breeze.
everything was very normal and uneventful, i walked for about 5 or 600 yards along the beach until we reached the first row of groynes, at which we turned around to return. after walking back for 100 yards or so i saw a white blinking light far off out over the sea, i paid it no real attention assuming it to be an plane - (easyjet from alicante) on its way to bristol airport. which is a few miles away and brean is on its direct flight path.
over the next 5 minutes or so it continued to travel across the sky at a right angle to my position - just as i'd expect an aircraft heading toward bristol airport to do. then it finally caught my attention as odd - because it seemed to be descending as it came in over the coastal headland to the north of me. i thought to myself  - that can't be an aircraft, it must be a helicopter, it's too low.
all the time it continued to blink, much as you'd expect an aircraft to do. except it was only the one single white/slightly yellowish tinged light.
it descended downwards over the following few minutes at an angle of about 20 until it was down below the height of the headland - i'm estimating its height at this point to be about 200 feet, and it's distance from me to be a mile or so away.
it then appeared to become stationary in the air - although there was no sound - i still thought i was seeing a helicopter - until i realised it wasn't stationary at all and in fact had turned at a right angle and was actually traveling directly towards me.
i moved about 10 yards up the beach away from the sea to get a clearer angle to see if the light was indeed traveling towards my position. i could now clearly see the light was moving parallel to the coast along the sea edge of the beach. it continued silently and slowly to descend as it travelled along.
as it was drawing nearer the light appeared more and more brighter and the blinking seemed to be more of a pulsing than a blink.
the light then drew level with my position. it was by now less than 40 yards from me and approximately 30 feet above me. it was really quite bright - (not blindingly) but enough to be dazzling and the pulsing quality was less defined because of the glare. although it was definitely still pulsing.
the light was now totally stationary, by now i was feeling increasingly disturbed by what was happening and began backing up the beach away from it - i was distinctly uneasy and kept watching it as i moved away.
although it may well of just been fear induced - i had the horrible feeling of being watched. 
the light then started to move away - back out over the sea and gradually began to ascend as it moved away.
it continued to retreat and ascend moving back towards the north west of me towards the general area i first saw it come from.
i found, in my unsettled state i'd missed the track back to the main road and had to double back on myself for about 50 yards, until i found it again. all the time i kept watching the blinking light retreating upwards and seawards as it went, for another 5 or so minutes - until it gradually disappeared in the haze of the horizon.
i had the distinct impression that whatever it was - it came in from the sea and deliberately was drawn towards me by the fact that i was alone and drawing attention to myself with the torch i was carrying.
i'm a grown man, but i'd be the first to admit - the experience has quite spooked me.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A star-like flashing white light, moving slowly, changing direction and moving deliberately toward me before hovering in front of me

content.detailedDescription: i am a regular osserver of the sky following all the geo engineering happenning daily in our region. it was one of the rare evening without chemtrails blocking the sunset...I looked towards the sunset and at approx 15-20degrees from horizon there was a very curved thick white line that was small then expanding the shooting out across the sky...Its so hard to explain hopefully i can post my video as well....At some points you can see a dark center of these curved white lines...Try to imagine a snowblower in the sky shooting out snow, sometimes to the left, sometimes to the right and often both directions at once all while hovering east west and north south.
content.summary: Curved thick white lines shot through the horizon joining a dark object, video will explain better

content.detailedDescription: Three hovering lights caught on trail camera
content.summary: Ufo trail cam hatley wi

content.detailedDescription:
Attached is a video i took on saturday september 3, 2016 at 9:44 pm in troy vermont. the video is only 9 seconds long. at the time my friend and i were sitting on the back deck of another friends house star gazing and we spotted something. i quickly turned my iphone video on, but as you can hear in the audio we thought it was gone. at first glance you may be able to make out a small white light in the center of the video, but it is very quick. i have played it on various movie players and some of them do not show anything. i assure you there is a light, as my windows 10 shows it pretty clear. i tried to enhance it on a copy of the video and it seemed very strange to me. the light actually swirls a bit, pulsates, and then does a little loop and shoots up to the right and top of the frame.
i was hoping that you had resources to analyze the video and let me know what you think. i used a magnifying glass to zoom in while watching it and it was pretty interesting.
it was a star filled clear night and the iphone was pointed almost straight up, looking almost directly south, but a little west.
i am not saying that this is definitively anything. i know i wasn't holding the iphone just in my hand. i wanted a steady picture so i just turned it on and had it resting on a table holding it tilted upward. the motion of the light does not appear to be movement of the iphone to me.
anyways, thought i'd share it to see if someone couldn't enhance it, slow it down, and zoom in. as a former mufon member i knew you would be a reputable organization to send it to.
i hope to hear back from you, and maybe even get an enhanced version.
content.summary: When my friend and i saw a light moving in the star lit sky i turned my iphone video on to record it

content.detailedDescription:
It was mid august 1996 in rheinfelden, switzerland. i was at home watching tv in my living room. my mother was visiting and we both saw mysterious lights approaching from the west at a low altitude which we thought might be low flying aircraft. planes do fly over the area, but never that low. we went outside to get a better look. the object was travelling silently at a slow, constant velocity as if surveying the area. because of the complete absence of any sound, we both thought it could be air balloons. as the ship came in closer we were both surprised and shocked to realise that it was a huge, dark grey/ black, metallic craft of some sort. it had a strange shape like an elongated seven sided polygon. there were white or light green lights at each angled point and a couple in between. beneath the craft in the centre was a light that seemed to be moving, rotating or spinning haphazardly, possibly a smaller craft beneath the main one. the main craft itself did not hover or spin, but kept on moving in an easterly direction at an altitude of about 200 to 400 feet. my mother said she also observed lights in the fuselage area, but the shape of the craft above its base could not be determined. we lost sight of it when it was eventually obscured by cloud cover. i have never read or heard anything in the media or internet about this strange sighting and i have never reported it until now. a number of other people in neighbourhood also seemed to be observing the object from their balconies. we were not able to identify the huge craft, what it was remains a mystery.

perhaps there is a connection, perhaps not, but two days earlier my partner at the time witnessed a ball lightning incident in the same living room from where i first saw the lights of the ufo approaching. a very bright white orb shaped light appeared in the top right hand corner of the room for about 10 seconds before suddenly vanishing. there were thunderstorms in the area at the time, but not in rheinfelden.
content.summary: Dark grey, metallic, elongated seven sided polygon shaped object with lights observed over rheinfelden, switzerland in summer of 1996

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my back patio having coffee and i was looking up at the sky.It was a clear morning no clouds.This object just went in a straight line path and then just blended with the sky.
content.summary: I have seen these egg shaped objects for two years now on and off .I am still trying to figure out what it is .Every time i get up to go for my camera it's gone.

content.detailedDescription:
1.I was walking
2.I do not know, maybe unconsciously i 3.Looked into it
i was shocked i did not know what happened, but i knew that watching me, and it is not a normal thing
4.Spherical volume and gaseous.The object with little distance from me and my older sister hung in the air
5.We knew watching us.We knew not a normal phenomenon.I was afraid i was shocked and did not know is what happens.We looked unmoved.We were fascinated by it.In front of us was hovering .After a few minutes passed without any harm to us.
6.Went full speed into the sky and disappeared in an instant
content.summary: Spherical volume and a gas light was self-crossing

content.detailedDescription: September 30th 2016 around 840pm in arvada colorado i noticed 7-9 glowing round white cream see thru objects flying in a boomerang formation appear off of the eastern horizon flying west in straight line all the lights were the same size and in almost perfect boomerang formation.No noise from them and goin fast..I've seen ducks,drones,chinese lanterns and planes fly out from dia this was none of them.I was looking east and could see something faint coming towards me i watched them fly over my head about 3,000 feet in the sky and head west took about 5 seconds and they were already in the mountains
content.summary: 7-9 cream white orbs flying in a boomerang position

content.detailedDescription: It was my husbands night off and a nice night out, we decided to sit on our porch swing as we usually do when the weather is nice. the temp was around 72 degrees and it was an absolutely clear night sky. out here we can see the stars very well. i can see the satellites as they cross with the naked eye and i watch the meteor showers annually while laying on a blanket in the yard. milky way is bright and clear here in mineral wells, tx, about 60 miles west of fort worth, tx. i was alone while my husband was changing clothes inside. as i was sitting on the swing i leaned my head back and looked up into the sky. it was then that i saw this half moon object cross into my view over the tree in my yard. it was glowing softly as if it was reflecting the ambient light of the town. i believe them to be disc shaped but i was only seeing the reflective angle. at first i could not imagine what it was i was seeing. it was moving slowly, at that point i stood up to try to get a better look when a second one came up behind the first very quickly. as soon as the the second object came into view, both of them moved very fast across the skyline. as they crossed my somewhat broad view of the horizontal skyline (above the treetops). took them less than 10 seconds to cross.  it seemed that the first ufo was waiting for the second one to catch up, then they just took off. one behind the other at the same speed and slightly angled from each other. looked like a formation maneuver that we use in flight of our fighter jets. i stood there on the porch for a second or two just stunned, i couldn't move or process what i had just seen for a moment. asking myself if it was real. i was shocked.  then i started screaming for my husband. i trying to explain what i had just seen. i couldn't quite put it into words at first because i as so excited and amazed. i kept thinking no one will ever believe me because i live in a very small town of about 15,000. what are the odds that anyone of them would have been looking into the sky at that exact moment. even my husband, who is a true believer, had a look of skepticism. very excited and frustrated because i was the only witness. i watch airplanes regularly cross this skyline view. this moved much faster and the ufo's were much bigger than any airplane or helicopter that has ever passed my view of the skyline, as i sit on my porch at least 4-5 days of the week when its nice weather. i know that what i saw was not man-made and much, much too fast and it was too big to be ours. even with our modern technology, we are not capable of this type of air travel.
content.summary: Sitting on porch. first one came over the treeline and slowed then second one caught up. both crossed my line of sight going ne at high speed.

content.detailedDescription:
Vers le 20 aot 2015  sainte-marthe-sur-le-lac, dehors avec mes 2 enfants, 3 de leurs amis, une voisine et mon ami.

mon ami a attir notre attention sur des flash toil orang, srement color par les couleurs du couch soleil, mais c'est brillantes toiles se sont mis  apparatre et disparatre (du bas vers le haut des cimes des arbres) tout en restant sur place. une appart et dispart, ensuite 3 apparurent presque en mme temps. mais c'est flash en forme d'toile ce sont mis s'adoucir en laissant voir leurs forme ovale, blanc  l'intrieur et jaune orange extrieur, puis ils ont files vers le nord/ouest ou nord direction mirabel en une fraction de seconde.

nous tions 7 tmoins excit et heureux. 2 enfants de 5 ans, 1 de 6 ans demi et 1 de 7 ans et 3 adultes 34, 40 et 56 ans environ. nous avons tous vue la mme chose et tions d'accord sur le fait que ctaient des ovni. 

personne n'a eu peur, quand mme qu'ils taient loin de nous. 
quelques petits allo de la main et sont partie.


mais: seule avec mon amis en jasent de cette exprience sous le ciel toil, une brillante toile a attir mon attention au dessus de nous.
une brillante lumire blanche/argent pareille comme les 5 autres, celle-ci tais plus brillante, comme une toile mais plus grand en diamtre, je me suis mise  l'observer attentivement et a lueur c'est mise a diminuer pour apparatre d'un belle sphre blanche et up, elle est partie en hauteur vers l'espace, en un claquement doigt je suis reste bouche b!
content.summary: 3  5 orbs: ovale sphrique de couleur blanc / jaune orange lumineux.
